column4: hi! i am runing ubuntu 11.10 'upgraded from 11.04' and i had kde installed , although i removed kde i still have 'kubuntu
hi .... how can i remove kde 'kubuntu' screen when booting or shutting down!? i am running ubuntu 11.02 upgraded from 11.04 and i had kde installed!
I'm afraid the best way is to reinstall the system
